submitConsignment.p: Complete the form opposite with as much detail as possible.
Upload up to six images of the property including front and back and artist / maker signatures or marks.
Our specialists will review your submission and we will do our best to respond to you within 5 business days.

howItWorksCopy: Send us images and a description of an individual item from your collection and we will provide complimentary auction estimates for items that we propose for auction.

If you do not see the artist or maker of your item in the menu, you will not be able submit online. You are always welcome to contact our departments directly by phone or email for further information.
If your item is accepted you will be contacted by a Phillips specialist who will discuss the most appropriate timing, auction and location to ensure the successful sale of your property.
whyPhillipsCopy: We’re focused. Phillips is the only international auction house to focus exclusively on the defining movements of the 20th and 21st centuries. We reflect contemporary culture in everything we do, and have set ourselves apart as a vibrant force in the art market because of it.

We’re global. Our clients have collections all over the world. Along with our salerooms in New York, London, Geneva and Hong Kong, Phillips has specialists throughout the Americas, Europe and Asia. We can help you get your work to the right auction in the right place at the right time.

We’re innovative. Phillips is committed to helping clients enjoy and engage with our auctions in ways that are best suited to them, reimagining what it means to be a global platform for buying and selling contemporary art and design in the digital age.

consignmentForm.secondaryMktNote: Please note that we cannot accept consignments for artists who have no secondary market history.

placeholders.name: Your name
placeholders.title: Title of item
placeholders.additionalDetails:
Additional details (optional)
E.g. history of ownership, price history, literature
placeholders.watchDetails: Please provide details on materials, accessories, and reference number

consignmentForm.makerNotAvailable: Online consignments aren’t available for that artist/maker right now. Please contact our Client Services team for further information

errorMsg.name: Your name is required
errorMsg.artistMaker: Artist or Maker name is required
errorMsg.title: Title is required
errorMsg.year: Year is required. You may also enter an approximate year
errorMsg.dimension: Dimensions are required. You can enter exact dimensions or approximate sizes (for example: small, medium or large)

submitConsignment.p: 填寫右方表格並提供所知詳情
最多可上載6張圖片，展示藏品的正面、背面、藝術家/設計師的簽名或標記。
富藝斯專家將審查提交內容，盡力在5個工作日提供答覆。

howItWorksCopy: 傳送藏品的圖片及簡述給我們，專家團隊將為閣下提供免費估價。
如果閣下藏品的藝術家或設計師未有包括在表格內，你將無法在網上遞交表格。歡迎閣下透過電話或電郵與我們直接聯絡。
當閣下的藏品獲接納為拍品，富藝斯專家團隊將會與閣下商討最合適的拍賣時間、類別和地點，確保藏品能成功拍出。
whyPhillipsCopy: 專注。富藝斯是唯一專注二十及二十一世紀藝術與設計品的國際拍賣行，以嶄新模式呈獻當代藝術文化，在拍賣市場上佔有獨特地位。
全球性。富藝斯的客戶網絡遍佈全球，於紐約、倫敦、日內瓦及香港均設有拍賣中心，定期舉行拍賣會及展覽，並不斷積極拓展歐美及亞洲各地的專家團隊及代辦處，確保閣下的藏品在合適的時間、拍賣類別及地點推出。
創新。富藝斯致力為收藏家提供專業卓越的服務及意見，透過網上拍賣平台，讓世界各地的藏家體驗現今數碼時代的當代藝術和設計的交易。

consignmentForm.secondaryMktNote: 我們一律不接受沒有二級市場記錄之藝術家委託拍品。

placeholders.name: 姓名
placeholders.artistMakerOptional: 藝術家或設計師 (可選的)
placeholders.title: 作品名稱
placeholders.additionalDetails: 如有其他額外資料，舉例來源、成交紀錄、文學
placeholders.watchDetails: 請提供作品的物料、配件及參考編號

consignmentForm.makerNotAvailable: 網上徵集平台暫時無法確認該藝術家或設計師。請與富藝斯客戶服務部聯絡。
